content: So few things, on renewals, I'll step back and say that, from all the work that IBM did last year as we were approaching the spin and then the Kyndryl team since, we have brought -- we really have brought the customer base on this journey with us and the backlog that we brought, the substantial backlog that we bought over with us really does represent like the customer base and their vote of confidence on Kyndryl's and what it can -- what it can ultimately help them achieve, which are a set of really complex journeys related again to them transforming their business to be more competitive.
